typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesDeathsSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CouuntryLookupsource
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimDatesource
CasesDeathsSource filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> continentFilter
continentFilter, CouuntryLookupsource lookup(CasesDeathsSource@country == CouuntryLookupsource@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CountryLookup
CountryLookup select(mapColumn(
		country = CasesDeathsSource@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population = CasesDeathsSource@population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	TotalConfirmed = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsPivot
DimDatesource aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	Max_Date_yearOftheWeek = max(date)) ~> MaxDateOfWeek
CasesAndDeathsPivot, MaxDateOfWeek join(year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ReportedDateJoin
ReportedDateJoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Processed_cases_deaths_target_file.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EuropeTransformationcasesdeathsData
